parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable or disable a control of the currently active user dialog. Disabled controls cannot be clicked onto.

Read [[Arma: GUI Configuration]] for more information about user dialogs and controls.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlEnable''' [idc, enable]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, enable]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] - control ID

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]] - true to enable the control, false to disable it

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> controlName '''ctrlEnable''' enable

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value>  controlName: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[ctrlEnable]] [100, [[false]]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[ctrlEnable]] [[false]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlEnabled]]
</value></part></template>



[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|CTRLENABLE]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.96|CTRLENABLE]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on July 20, 2017 - 11:59 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Yuval|Yuval]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Please do note that enabled controls can gain focus upon click. Therefore do not enable background controls or else they will cover any controls on top of them.<br>
As a general rule of thumb, enabled controls should only be already on the top of the GUI.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes -->
</comment>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 7, 2020 - 22:26 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:R3vo|R3vo]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
One can disable a control when it is loaded by using [[ctrlEnable]] in the [[User_Interface_Event_Handlers#onLoad|onLoad]] event handler.

<code>class MyDialog
{
    class MyControl
    {
        [[User_Interface_Event_Handlers#onLoad|onLoad]] = "([[Magic Variables#this|_this]] [[#]] 0) [[ctrlEnable]] [[false]];";
    };
};</code>

</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
